channel.title: fox on The Herald
channel.description: Recent content in fox on The Herald

item.title: The Fox Without a Tail
item.description: It happened that a FOX caught its tail in a trap, and in struggling to release himself lost all of it but the stump.

item.title: The Fox and the Grapes
item.description: FOX, very hungry, chanced to come into a vineyard, where hung branches of charming ripe grapes, but nailed up to trellis so high, that he leaped till he quite tired himself without being able to reach one of them.

item.title: The Lions Share
item.description: THE Lion went once a-hunting along with the Fox, the Jackal, and the Wolf.

item.title: The Fox and the Crow
item.description: A Fox once saw a Crow fly off with a piece of cheese in its beak and settle on a branch of a tree.
